text: Kenneth Thomas Casanega (February 18, 1921 â€“ October 10, 2021) was an American football quarterback. He played two seasons with the San Francisco 49ers in 1946 and 1948. Casanega died in Medford, Oregon on October 11, 2021, at the age of 100.Ken Casanega, last living member of original 49ers, dies at 100 ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football quarterbacks Category:American centenarians Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Sportspeople from California
